pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'ICD' Programs for Injury Categorization in R // Categorization and scoring of injury severity typically involves trained personnel with access to injured persons or their medical records. 'icdpicr' contains a function that provides automated calculation of Abbreviated Injury Scale ('AIS') and Injury Severity Score ('ISS') from International Classification of Diseases ('ICD') codes and may be a useful substitute to manual injury severity scoring. 'ICDPIC' was originally developed in 'Stata', and 'icdpicr' is an open-access update that accepts both 'ICD-9' and 'ICD-10' codes.
